column3: Apache Spark is a fast and general-purpose cluster computing system. It provides high-level APIs in Java
column6: and an optimized engine that supports general execution graphs.

column3: Spark Cassandra Connector: This library lets you expose Cassandra tables as Spark RDDs
column4: write Spark RDDs to Cassandra tables
column5: and execute arbitrary CQL queries in your Spark applications.
